column1: Wearing masks can help reduce the spread of coronavirus, but the practice has led to a new complaint — “maskne,” breakouts caused by wearing a mask for long periods of time. https://dailyjournalonline.com/lifestyles/health-med-fit/how-to-prevent-maskne-and-other-face-mask-skin-issues-according-to-dermatologists/article_b0ca7c7e-b511-503d-ae84-0c50c8e64b45.html?utm_campaign=snd-autopilot&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter_dailyjournalmo
